title: Win a Copy of Ill Met by Moonlight, a True Crime Novel
text: Win a Copy of Ill Met by Moonlight, a True Crime Novel - Entry method: Gleam - How often you can enter: Once - Ends: a month from now We are offering one lucky reader a copy of Ill Met by Moonlight by René Weis. EACH ACTION BELOW IS WORTH AN ENTRY. COMPLETE ALL THE ACTIONS FOR YOUR MAXIMUM CHANCE OF WINNING. The true story of one of the most contested murders in France, when in 1952, a British family settled down to sleep beside their car in a lay-by, and were brutally murdered before daybreak.
